item.title: AM add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "From tender youth we are told by father and teacher that betrayal is the most heinous offence imaginable. But what is betrayal? Betrayal means breaking ranks and breaking off into the unknown. Sabina knew of nothing more magnificent than going off into the unknown." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: AM add a quote by Milan Kundera / میلان کوندرا
item.description: "He Kept recalling her lying on his bed; she reminded him of no one in his former life." -- Milan Kundera / میلان کوندرا

item.title: AM add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "He had entered Parmenides' magic field: he was enjoying the sweet lightness of being." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: AM add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description:
"She had an overwhelming desire to tell him, like the most banal of women. Don't let me go, hold me tight, make me your plaything, your slave, be strong! But they were words she could not say.
The only thing she said when he released her from his embrace was, "You don't know how happy I am to be with you." That was the most her reserved nature allowed her to express." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: AM add a quote by Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)
item.description: "Did she know her bones were beautiful to me?" -- Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)

item.title: AM add a quote by Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)
item.description: "The mystery again; the things you say and do that inspire love in another; the things you see and hear in another that make you fall in love." -- Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)

item.title: AM add a quote by Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)
item.description: "...my knee was touching hers under the table and our bodies were so new to each other that even this touching was breathtaking." -- Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)

item.title: AM add a quote by Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)
item.description: "since I can't win your past or even, to be honest, any certain future, since I can't carry you off to a place where there is no memory, can you at least tell me I was all-alone-nobody-ever-like-me special in some way, no matter how small?" -- Robert Olen Butler (They Whisper)

item.title: AM add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "I have the true feeling of myself only when I am unbearably unhappy." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: AM add a quote by Franz Kafka
item.description: "The meaning of life is that it stops." -- Franz Kafka

item.title: AM add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "The most delicious sensation of all is the re-birth of healthy human love. Spring coming back to Earth!" -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: AM add a quote by Aleister Crowley
item.description: "People think that talking is a sign of thinking. It isn't, for the most part' on the contrary, it's a mechanical dodge of the body to relieve oneself of the strain of thinking, just as exercising the muscles helps the body to become temporarily unconscious of its weight, its pain, its weariness, and the foreknowledge of its doom." -- Aleister Crowley

item.title: AM add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Hope is the thing with feathers That perches in the soul And sings the tune without the words And never stops at all." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: AM add a quote by Emily Dickinson
AM add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: AM add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Of all the animals, man is the only one that is cruel. He is the only one that inflicts pain for the pleasure of doing it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: AM add a quote by Zdzislaw Beksinskiski
item.description: "I have my own world, which if I paint it, can be a nightmare in your eyes. Similarly, some consider discoteques a hell, others, the gates of heaven. What I paint is above all else, a spiritual self-portrait of me." -- Zdzislaw Beksinskiski

item.title: AM add a quote by Zdzilsaw Beksinski
item.description: "I am obsessed with the process of creation." -- Zdzilsaw Beksinski
